options.content:
See Individual Flows for $Country

Flow Data by Country
  • This dashboard shows top flows with the specified country as the source or destination.
  • The first set of tables show top twenty data by both volume and rate and then the set of top pairs of organizations sharing data.
  • Other statistics about data to and from this country, including a Sankey graph for the top sources by volume, is then listed.
  • Please note that rate will be zero if only one sampled flow was detected.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:"" AND meta.src.community:$community AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
